content: crochet granny square crop top pattern this top is made with 37 granny squares pattern for each appearing below that measure roughly between 3 5 and 4 in size yarn weight sport hook 3 5mm sewing needle large enough to accommodate yarn gauge 16dc and 10 double_crochet row = 4 fit does not depend on a tight adherence to gauge size small/medium granny square pattern row 1- magic_ring ring with chain 2 and 12 double_crochet use chain 2 for first double_crochet and half_double_crochet in new row chain 3 for first tc slip_stitch with first double_crochet of row row 2- *2tc cluster chain 2* repeat ** 12 times slip_stitch with first tc cluster row 3- working in chain spaces *3hdc 3hdc 3dc chain 3 3dc* repeat** until end slip_stitch with first double_crochet of row row 4- working in chain spaces *3dc 3dc 3dc 3dc chain 3 3dc* repeat** until end slip_stitch with first double_crochet of row 2tc cluster= yo 2 times insert hook in st yo pull through st yo pull through 2 lps on hook 2 times yo 2 times insert hook in same st yo pull through st yo pull through 2 lps on hook 2 times pull through all 3 lps on hook chain 1 construction/assembly using whipstitch with sewing needle assemble squares as follows
